Developer's guide
=================

This section is here for those who are building/exploring the
internals of PRRTE in its source code form, most likely through a
developer's tree (i.e., a Git clone).

If you are simply *using* PRRTE, you probably don't need to read this
section.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   prerequisites.rst
   git-github
   gnu-autotools
   sphinx
   rst-for-markdown-expats.rst
